feed.title: Journal of Homeland Security and Emergency Management
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Journal of Homeland Security and Emergency Management

entry.title: Safety First or Saving Lives? How Medical Responders Would Decide when Facing an Active Violent Incident. Results from an Explorative Cross-National Survey

entry.title: Beyond Chinese Spy Balloons: Why We Need to Teach East Asian Studies in U.S. Homeland Security and Emergency Preparedness Programs

entry.title: How a Chemical Weapons Threat Positively Impacted a Hospital’s Emergency Preparedness
